text:
Good Eggs | San Francisco, CA | Full Time | Software Engineer / DevOps

Good Eggs is the best grocery store for people who love to cook. We bring handpicked groceries from local farmers and foodmakers right to your door. We're building an alternative food system with better food, more integrity, and less waste than traditional grocery. We hold ourselves and our producers to the highest standards of honesty, transparency and sustainability.

We are seeking Software Engineers for our web, iOS, devops, and data teams. We're mostly full-stack Javascript (Node, Angular), with some components written in Python and Go. DevOps folks will help build out our container infrastructure, so experience with Docker, rkt, ECS, and CoreOS is a plus.

For more information, take a look at our full job listings: https://www.goodeggs.com/about/jobs
